titles.title: To extend and make a technical correction to the temporary suspension of duty on certain cast stainless steel single-piece exhaust gas manifolds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/25/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) amend the article description for certain cast stainless steel single-piece exhaust gas manifolds, and (2) temporarily extend the duty treatment of such articles.
